website_summaries.verdict: For TiVo Premiere owners with iOS devices, the TiVo Stream is a cool addition to your AV setup and mobile life.
pros: The TiVo Stream lets you easily stream and download programs wirelessly from your TiVo DVR to an iPhone, iPad, or iPod Touch
cons: The Stream currently only works with iOS devices, and the app functionality could be more robust
It has TiVo Premiere support only and requires a wired Internet connection for the DVR and Stream

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me, update on how to activate.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to add streaming to a Roamio, and it worked well for me. Despite directions saying you can only use the app to activate (with a known bug of taking 24 hours to activate), I was able to activate it immediately using the web from my PC. Tried the app like directions say, and like everyone reports, wasn't showing up as activated. Logged into my TiVo devices web page, and was able to activate it immediately using the TSN printed on the bottom of the device. After that, it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Think twice about the TiVo Stream...
customer_reviews.text: The Roamio OTA DVR is a great standalone unit. Having said that, there is room for improvement when it comes to streaming content to a personal device, i.e. iPad. Since the OTA does not come with streaming capability, the TiVo Stream must be purchased to enable that function. I made the purchase, Amazon delivered, and the Stream failed miserably to integrate into my system even after following the directions exactly as written. Along with it not working properly, the Apple App store has a 2 1/2 star review which speaks volumes. TiVo, you need to get it together. This is subpar and unacceptable. Needless to say, the Stream was returned. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the device I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had been told by Tivo Support that the streaming device would allow me to connect my Tivo HD to my new Tivo Edge. That was not true but I did not learn this until after I had order the streaming device. I was able to return the device. This device is only used with Tivo Premier, but is listed as a method for connected any Tivo recorder.
customer_reviews.author: R. Newbury

customer_reviews.title: I'll let you know when it actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Right now I will give it a one star because it flat out doesn't work. Apparently TiVo is working on a solution...the issue is that it must first update it's firmware when you go to add it to your system, and it always fails. It is a known issue, per WeaKnees, the vendor. To their credit they are keeping me updated, but at this point I've had it for 3 weeks and it has never worked. If it does get resolved I will update my review. If not, I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars if Setup Was Easier
customer_reviews.text: Set up is a bear. Period. Took 24 hours of repeat efforts and calls to TiVo support. They were always pleasant and helpful, but there was little to no instant gratification. With that said, it just suddenly started working. Wow. If TV on a phone or tablet is what you're after, it plain works simply and easily. Very nice. Good picture. No buffering or skipping.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burns

customer_reviews.title: It works 90% of the time, but reconnecting can be frustrating
customer_reviews.text: It works most of the time, but I still have issues with my iPad losing the streaming connection in another room. I use the streaming feature when I'm in the upstairs kitchen (at which point the Stream and my iPad are probably about 12 feet apart), and the streaming often fails and has to be reestablished. Sometimes I know it happens because I've tried to jump ahead too quickly (i.e. through commercials), but other times it just does it on its own. Haven't had any issues on the ability to download shows to my iPad, but, obviously, you'll have to wait as long as your wifi network's speed requires you to.
customer_reviews.author: Dashing Dave

customer_reviews.title: Tivo Tech Provided Bad Info
customer_reviews.text: I spoke with Tivo tech support before purchasing and confirmed that I could use it away from home to stream to my Nexus 5, With the latest update to Nexus everything will stream fine. The only exception, live streaming from some providers but if it was previously recorded on my home Tivo, all recordings will stream. Not true. Streaming away from home is not allowed, even if it is recorded in my home Tivo, by a huge number of copyright holders. I called Tivo back, got another tech who said, Oh Yeah, can't stream copy protected unless you are on your home network where your dvr is located. Get your act together Tivo.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I am a recent cord cutter, and absolutely love the Stream. I am able to watch live TV on multiple iOS tablets or phones, which has made it easy to watch things like news programs in rooms where there is no TV, like my home office, or even in the hot tub. My favorite feature is the ability to watch programs on my home TiVo DVR while traveling. And, in cases where I know that wifi availability will be limited, I can download programs onto my iPad. These features were not offered by my uncompetitive former cable vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The device works only on the certain network's shows (ABC, NBC, CBS, FOX, CW) which have not blocked streaming of their programs. Copyright protection prevents streaming of the cable networks like HBO, History, USA, ESPN, TNT etc. TIVO staff is aware of this, but did not disclose the issue when I asked before purchasing the product. Anything for a buck, I guess?
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Valued addition to my TiVo experiance!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this thing added to my TiVo home network. Now I can stream my recorded shows and live TV anywhere, inside or outside my home. No TV on my deck? No problem... pull up my phone or tablet and watch TV right there. At my mother-in-laws while the games on? Pulled up live TV and didn't miss any of the action. As a cord-cutter, I now have more features than I did with cable... all at a much lower price!
customer_reviews.author: David Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Works Well Most of the Time
customer_reviews.text: TiVo Stream has made it very easy for my wife and I to transfer shows to our iPads when we go on trips but the live streaming of recorded content is hit or miss. The Stream isn't always able to generate the connection and we get an error. I was also extremely disappointed to learn that TiVo has deliberately prevented connection to the Stream over VPN. I'm giving it 4 stars in the hope that they unlock that ability someday... please? Overall, I would buy again but for a $130 independent box, it does what a TiVo Premier should be able to do itself.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well on iPad but Android support is not there and maybe won't be in the future....
customer_reviews.text: With Tivo discontinuing support of the free version of Tivo Desktop on 6/5/2013, you would hope that they would make an Android app at some point..... Unfortunately, this is iPad only and it works fairly decently for what it does..... it converts the video in about 1/4 the time of realtime, especially for HD content. I hope Android support comes soon but even they said it may be coming but not in the immediate future.... it's a shame really.... For now, I'll stick to Tivo Desktop and convert the files using CUDA on my laptop which does the conversion faster and with slightly better quality so that I can play them on my laptop or Android tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Glenn

customer_reviews.title: You knew this was possible...
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that the internals of a TiVo were recently upgraded in the latest Roamio Plus and Pro, but all the rest of us with Premiers and just plain Roamios need this box to translate the streams and recorded shows for viewing on external systems like my iPad and laptop. Now no matter where I am, I can watch my recorded shows via the Stream as long as I can connect to the Internet. It's about time, and I am glad I bought it. You can even watch shows in remote rooms in your house over your wireless, if you have N speeds or better. Thanks TiVo, and thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works, finicky setup
customer_reviews.text: This works and is kinda nice for watching in bed or in the back yard. Setup appeared to be automatic, but the unit wasn't recognized after entering information, the first 2 times, stopping 2 out of 4 steps through. After setup was successful, it would only stream non-copyrighted material for a bit - until I figured out that one must turn of mobile data on their phone in order for the Stream to conclude it's on the same network as the phone. Mildly annoying, but hardly a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to activate it by calling TIVO
customer_reviews.text: I am a tivo afficianado. I bought this last week so we could download things to watch while traveling. I spent three calls on the phone to get it working and wasted my time. It is NOT plug and play. I followed the directions and then when it didn't work properly I began calling customer support. Nothing they told me helped. I woke up the next morning and all was working. GREMLINS.
customer_reviews.author: El Dudereeno

customer_reviews.title: World-class patience-training device
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this product, and when it works, it is a 4-5 star item. However, the number of times it drops connections without any real cure other than repeated restarts, the wildly unpredictable down/upload speeds, and the unreliability of streaming keeps this product far from its potential. When it works, it's great, but be prepared to have your patience tested. If you don't have any other option, then it's still a must-buy because it really does change your television experience in a meaningful way (and is a godsend when traveling). If you do, however, then look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: ZA

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great, but the execution is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great, but the execution is horrible. First I had to contact support and force an update to even get it to install. Then once it was "working" it would last less than 30 minutes before stopping and needing a reboot. After three weeks of trying to get it to work I gave up and returned. It never let me stream an entire show to any device and always crashed before finishing a download to a device device. It is a piece of junk. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hyman

customer_reviews.title: TIVO Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This connects to the TIVO app (free) and streams any recorded or live TV on your tablet or phone. Think about that for a second, live TV anywhere you are, on your tablet or phone, unlimited use, no monthly fees. It's a bit bandwidth hungry because it's hi-def, but overall livable. Also, the functionality is built into certain newer TIVO boxes so check your specs before buying. I have a used ROKU for sale IM me....
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on Android
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one now that they finally support Android. Works great on home Wi-Fi as well as LTE on my phone. Much better quality than Slingbox and audio and video stay in sync. Also the app is very easy to navigate and fun to use. The guide is very responsive on mobile devices unlike the old IR blasters used by Slingbox where you had to wait a few seconds between commands. If you use a TiVo this is a great addition and nice to not have to pay an additional monthly fee for it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott3r

customer_reviews.title: Works VERY well.
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this device I believe it provides good benefit. I can now remove my computer as an intermediary for when I want to get shows from my TiVo onto my iPad. Because you had to transfer the entire HD show from your TiVo to your computer before it would then convert it to an iPad friendly video format; the Stream cuts about half of the time out of transferring, maybe even more. Also, the ability to just live stream a show without transferring it first works really well too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: No Android Support
customer_reviews.text: While the product description does say iPhone and iPad, and it does not mention Android, there is an adroid app, so I went ahead and purchased this. My fault, but the Android App does almost nothing. You can push a 'watch now' button on Android, but what it does is start the show on the TV connected to the Tivo. In other words, it's like a remote control. Tivo support says there will be a fully functioning Android App someday, they could not allude to when.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: This product works as TIVO intended. It streams well to the tivo mini and even streams well to cell phone. Unfortunately, I still need my Slingbox. Too many channels are copyrighted and cannot be watched outside of the home with tivo stream. It's disappointing to need a slingbox for steaming outside of home and tivo stream for tivo mini at home. It works great for the functionality it has.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K

customer_reviews.title: The best way to watch your shows wherever you are!
customer_reviews.text: The TiVo Stream now completes my TiVo 'infrastructure' so that I can watch what I want, when I want and, now, where I want. The shows from my TiVo Roamio appear on my iPad Mini in the TiVo app when I'm home, but now also when I'm on vacation and have access to a WiFi network. Simple to add to my home network with just a wired network cable and power. Then one software update and 24 hours later I was streaming content. I highly recommend the TiVo Stream!
customer_reviews.author: Dale N.

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be great, but it is just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that when I try to stream a movie or show, it often says it can't find the box. I have to go through the set up process again and again. It will also stop streaming often. I have to close Tivo and then get back into it to watch on my Ipad. I thought that since it says Tivo "stream" it would stream just fine. I have a Roku which we never have a problem with and it is meant to stream movies. I would just like to watch the shows I have recorded on my Tivo. I am quite disappointed that the Tivo stream doesn't work constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, TiVo brings TV to our tablets and phones, yet again changing our viewing habits
customer_reviews.text: Just as TiVo ushered in the wave of DVR products, and still remains the best GUI for DVRs, they bring that power to the palm of our hands for those of us with older TiVo DVRs. In our case, we were contemplating a TV in our master bedroom and the kitchen, but decided against it, since we both had tablets and have more flexibility to watch individual programming anywhere on our property. The ability to stream content that was recorded to our hand-held devices is liberating, and also reduces the need for permanently-mounted A/V hardware in multiple locations in our house. Thanks, TiVo!
customer_reviews.author: Erik S. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the Stream for over a year now and I feel like it has even greater value with the new (BETA) app for FireTV. Yeah, it was great to be able to watch TiVO recordings on my Ipad or IPhone but it's awesome to watch on the second set that I decided to unhook from the underused cable box to save money. I hope the BETA trial is going well and that this TiVO application is here to stay on FireTV.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Get this!!
customer_reviews.text: This things works very very well, once it is setup. The setup instructions need to mention that there is another step to get it streaming. In the setup menu there is a selection to "make a service call". Once that is done, it is ready to go. This selection is on a pull down list where it is not readily visible. It is the last item on the list. Scroll down and select it. Once done, you should see a ready condition. I highly recommend this device. It is nice to be able to copy shows to my ipad or just stream them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave N

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the TiVo Stream for being able to watch programs remotely. I love the fact that I can watch recorded shows on my iPad. I will upgrade my review to 5 stars once live TV is available to watch remotely. My cable company offers an app to watch live TV but you can only use it when you're on your home wifi. Once I'm able to watch my TiVo away from home on wifi, I'd give this 10 stars if I could! The quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Computer Geek

customer_reviews.title: TiVo Stream is fantastic if you have one or more Tivo Premium XL DVRs
customer_reviews.text: I was able to watch shows from a beach resort recorded on 4 Tivo DVRs at my home. So no more missing my favorite sports shows from anywhere with great Wi-Fi. The only problem at the resort we stayed at is the speed was poor, except late at night. And I have an apartment near my work (about 230 miles from home), and that apartment has great wi-fi and so TiVo streaming works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to watch my shows on the iPad ...
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to watch my shows on the iPad while my boyfriend is studying. It works at home and far away. I've even downloaded my favorite shows and watched them on a flight. Have had a little trouble finding the right WiFi channel to use at home to prevent any lag but once you find it the Stream works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome manangement control and ease of access to anydevide within the network!
customer_reviews.text: We use the stream to view our programs anywhere on the network and the feture and quaility are excellent. Ease of management, download to Apple decices, or remote viewing are superb. A must extension to the Tivo Base unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. brandt

customer_reviews.title: Works smoothly with my iPad 2 at home
customer_reviews.text: It's like getting an extra TV screen when our single TV is occupied. Works well without much setup effort. Added the TiVo Stream and everything is working well. I'm using an Apple AirPort Extreme with both TiVo Roamio, and Stream connected using Ethernet. Streaming to my iPad 2 at home, through WiFi, is fast with excellent quality. Streaming Out-of-Home works well but the quality is lower. Most likely because my upstream speed is only 1.5 Megabits.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Aronian

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the networks copyright their shows to the point that TiVo Stream isn't allowed to let you transfer most shows to your iPad or iPhone for viewing while on the road. It's not TiVo's fault, just disappointing. Hopefully that will change.
customer_reviews.author: Sean310

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with the stream. I had problems at first but it was because the stream needed to update to the software in my tiro boxes in order to work properly. All I had to do was wait for it to do the updates and all was well. I always liked a little tv in my kitchen but hated all the cords. Problem solved! There are so many places to use it and it's just fun to have.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: TiVo Anywhere in the House! I love TiVo.
customer_reviews.text: Now that there are apps for both Apple and Android, it works great! I just wish TiVo had informed me when the Android app became available. I have not tried the remote viewing feature yet so I can't report if it works. In the house, on the same network, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burstiner

customer_reviews.title: simple, effective
customer_reviews.text: It works better when connected directly to the same router serving the Tivo. I had it on a remote hub and the setup was inconsistent. It operates as described, even streaming two shows simultaneously and on Android. Remote viewing is also as described (with moderate buffering) and works best on a non-cellular connection.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Urban

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just added the TiVo streaming. Love it. You can download your recording on your cell and watch it on a plane or on the road with out Internet. So excited. Two day shipping from Amazon prime is amazing. Two thumbs up....
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: TiVo Stream is a must-have for TiVo users
customer_reviews.text: I waited too long to get this. It's super easy to download shows on to your iPad or iPhone, remotely or in the home. And to stream. Great for sports games when you're on the road or when you just have to catch up on a backlog of shows. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Best add-on to my TiVo ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Easy to install and works as advertised. I had to go to Home Depot during a Patriots game. My son watched the game on my Android smartphone (Samsung Note 2) the way there and back. The big issue is the 4g signal strength. That's not the fault of the Stream though. Using the Stream in the house works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: RWm

customer_reviews.title: Good but be shure that you know what you are doing when you order this.
customer_reviews.text: OK but can not play movies or my recordings on my android tablet when I am away from my home network.
customer_reviews.author: RACmoney

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add a room for TV
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic way to add another room to a Tivo receiver. (Receiver must be at least a 4 tuner model) It will work with a power line adaptor but each end may have to be on the same leg on the circuit breaker box. Otherwise you can use a MOCA connection. No monthly fee.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa8

customer_reviews.title: No help from NetBetShop just some bad people
customer_reviews.text: A nice clear picture of total junk. The seller is not will not respond. This is a clear case of false and misleading advertising. This item doesn’t work with TiVo. It has been altered not to work with TiVo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It performs well
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the device as it does everything advertised. It is very easy to install and the app works great. Unfortunately it doesn't work with a wireless TiVo and that is the only idea tire I wish it had. I recommend this as it comes in handy if you want to watch a show on the porch on a cool evening or in the kitchen while cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Fergy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! I'm rarely in the room where our ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I'm rarely in the room where our TiVo is or even sitting still for long. Now I can watch my shows on my ipad or iphone and still be on the move. I usually find time to watch while I'm cooking or cleaning or relaxing in the tub. This product keeps our TiVo way less full!
customer_reviews.author: StephanieC

customer_reviews.title: Was good... until they broke it
customer_reviews.text: About a month ago Tivo did some software update to these devices. It made mine totally unusable. They keep saying were working on it but it's already been a month! Don't buy one until they fix these issues!
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, setup could have been easier.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works excellently inside and outside of our home network. Setup was a bit of a pain, not enough instructions and the updates required before it would connect properly were dirt slow. This could have been explained better. The Tivo App works wonderfully as well.
customer_reviews.author: billu@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and works great with our iPads
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and works great with our iPads, which is what I bought it for. Our TiVo Roamio and TiVo Mini both have to connect through power line adapters in our older home. The TiVo documentation says this is not supported, but it works well with the Stream.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas King

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and handy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying the Tivo Stream, it's very handy when I want to watch something different from the rest of the family (e.g., football) or when I'm not by a TV. I would buy it again and would definitely recommend it. It works great on my LG G3 and my wife's iPad II. Con: The only reason I didn't give it a five star was because it doesn't work well with my old Samsung Galaxy Tab(tm) 2 7.
customer_reviews.author: D. Paterno

customer_reviews.title: I spent about two hours on chat with customer support ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent about two hours on chat with customer support trying to update the firmware without fixing the issue. 10 days later I got a email from customer service that the issue was resolved. Followed instructions in the email and the stream is working now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Bean

customer_reviews.title: I'm hoping they get the bugs worked out because I like my Tivo
customer_reviews.text: While it does stream to my tablet with no problems, the software for the stream has many flaws and sometimes barely works; sometimes completely unresponsive. I'm hoping they get the bugs worked out because I like my Tivo..
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Jazzy Mick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to setup and has been working great ever since. Once it was installed, the TiVo apps on my devices each found it and prompted me to complete the setup. That took very little of my time, but it lets you know that it will potentially run for 20 minutes to complete the setup. I hit Next or Ok a few times, but it did all the work. The quality of the streaming is much better than i expected and so far I'm happy with this TiVo Stream.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Don't!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. TiVo streaming and their app suck. Constant stuttering, stopping, and skipping. Even contacting their support doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: ENeill

customer_reviews.title: At first Setup would not complete. But after googling ...
customer_reviews.text: At first Setup would not complete. But after googling the problem, found the fix. Then all is as promised: I can stream any recorded or live channel to iPhone and iPad. Even from a remote location away from home, I can stream, provided I use wifi.
customer_reviews.author: myplanet

customer_reviews.title: Setup was pretty simple activate it on line at TiVo
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Streams content from my TiVo Premiere & Roamio DVRs to my Android Tablet and to my computers via TiVo's on line web site. Setup was pretty simple activate it on line at TiVo.com then just plug power and Ethernet cable in and I was good to go.
customer_reviews.author: ATMusky

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: The Stream is very easy to connect, but you need to wait about two days after connecting for it to get started showing programs. It is working to send live and recorded programs from a TiVo Premiere XL to my iPhone 5 and my iPad Air both inside my home network and away from home. The TiVo itself cannot be connected to the Internet by WiFi so that limits the number of people who can use it but I have my modem located near my TiVo for ethernet connection. When sending live programs the TiVo starts recording the show and then transmits it as it is being recorded.
customer_reviews.author: T. G. Santee

customer_reviews.title: Takes your basic Roamio to the next level
customer_reviews.text: + An absolute necessity to take full advantage of Basic Roamio - Reboots occasionally needed (not 100% whether due to hardware or software)
customer_reviews.author: Hun Kim

customer_reviews.title: This has worked fantastic. I had been using a slingbox with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked fantastic. I had been using a slingbox with a Series 3 Tivo and it was a pain( 3 to 6 second delay on every command). The controls for the TiVo stream work without delay and the picture appears to be HD on my IPad (local steaming). I haven't even tried to set it up for internet streaming yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Strange

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a day but set-up was simple (took about 20 minutes in total with updates). I tested it out on my phone and my tablet (android) and I was able to stream at home flawlessly. I haven't tried it outside of my home network yet.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Sherland Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it to work...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it more stars if I get the thing to work. My iPad recognizes it but can't get it to stream anything. This is on the same wifi network. Many times it drops off and it doesn't show up at all. If it worked as advertised, I would love it.
customer_reviews.author: DLNeal

customer_reviews.title: Returned the item after I couldn't get it to set up correctly
customer_reviews.text: Stream would not configure/set up properly with the app, so it never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great to watch on the go, and download shows. Expensive but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Neath

customer_reviews.title: Love it. No need to purchase an entire other ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. No need to purchase an entire other TiVo. You do need to hardware it, which is very easy if you have Fios. I note that the new "Skip" feature doesn't work with it though.
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but problems in canada
customer_reviews.text: This is a good unit and works well but it was a real pain to get the app in Canada. I have the TiVo service set up at a Canadian address so they will take my money but are restricting the stream app to US ONLY...
customer_reviews.author: Cyberdinex

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for household streaming. Take note, though, that if the DVR is very busy recording multiple channels, you may get streaming dropouts. Expect this, but for us, it's not that common.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Demchak

customer_reviews.title: Activation woes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new device and received a used device already activated on someone else's tivo account. Be aware that you need to activate this device on your account in order to use it, so a used device may entail a very long phone call to tivo service to get them to remove the device from the previous owner's account. That is obviously a problematic situation. Not a very well thought out activation model - Apple TV is way better.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Tivo and the stream makes it even better. Had a little trouble with the set up but the support folks got me going.
customer_reviews.author: Hal R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, worked great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier. 1, Roamio, 1 Stream, 3 Mini, the perfect system and my Comcast bill dropped $100 per month.
customer_reviews.author: DJL Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I could never get this product to work. ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I could never get this product to work. I spent countless hours with TIVO on the phone, but could never get it to pair with my ipad. There may have been other issues as well. My TIVO is set up to work wirelessly which may be the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Houston80

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Won't stream outside of home for most shows. Inside home is too slow to be worthwhile 99% of the time (we have a high-end router and wi-fi).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device- I Highly Recommend TiVo Stream
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device to use primarily with my IPad to free up my main TiVo Première for other members of the house hold. It also works great with my IPhone 5 as well. I have been using the device for a few months and I have also used it away from home using Internet cafes and hotel Wi-Fi's out of town with no issues. The free TiVo app works great with the now addition option of IPad or IPhone viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Ob1gui

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: A must have for TiVo Premiere DVRs. Has been working good for 3 years & counting. About once a month is freezes up, but a power cycle puts it back into operation
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: I Should Have Bought This Sooner
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue activating it, but customer service fixed it in less than 10 minutes. Now it works great. Shows stream to the iPad with very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Seller Refuses Return
customer_reviews.text: I like this to potentially use with my 2 older models of TV, This has NEVER been used and the new models I am going to buy have this already built in the seller will not answer my emails about return of unused product
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it's suppose to. I've had a ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's suppose to. I've had a few errors when I stream and the Tivo is in Standby but taking the Tivo out of a Standby fixes it. The fee though is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Roach

customer_reviews.title: TiVo stream works!
customer_reviews.text: We were in San Francisco watching a recording of Downton Abbey when a promo for a local Milwaukee PBS program aired. Fire up the TiVo app on the iPad and told the TiVo at home to record the show. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: The Woz

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it has not been anything but aggrivation. First it was registered to somebody else and then when I got that resolved it worked only after running setup nearly every time. Not it does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn H

customer_reviews.title: One trick pony. But very good at it.
customer_reviews.text: I think this functionality should be standard with TiVo boxes if they want to compete... but regardless, set up was relatively painless and it works great. Can stream recorded Shows to my ipad now.
customer_reviews.author: gadget geek

customer_reviews.title: Works really good but you cannot stream movies away from home area
customer_reviews.text: Works really good but you cannot stream movies away from home area
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Low-quality fan makes it a noisy box!
customer_reviews.text: Product description needs to precisely say that you need a wired connection to your tivo. Furthermore, the box is VERY loud. The fan inside seems to be very low quality! Otherwise exactly what I was looking for! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Holger

customer_reviews.title: TiVo Stream works well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my TiVo Stream to be able to watch my recorded shows and live TV on a iPad. No more fighting over the TV with the wife and kids! Set-up was a little frustrating. iPad set-up went through steps 1-3 easily, but at step 4 (test streaming video) it would fail. I had to unplug the device and plug it back in several times before it worked. Now that it's running, it works great. The Stream device does have an annoying hum, though.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Brideau III

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Now can stream over WiFi external to my local WiFi with TiVo Premier units. Six more required words added to allow me to submit. Weird that I would have to do this Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Octothorp

customer_reviews.title: Be patient on initialization
customer_reviews.text: The device loses connection on occasion, but overall works very well. The setup can take a very long time as you have to login to the device and initialize it over the tivo website. Just be patient with it.
customer_reviews.author: mik3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow love it, I take my shows with me and can stream from anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is mediocre at best. It drops connection too frequently and errors out in the last minute for most shows. Is nice though as I can watch shows anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: S. Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to watch programming on a tablet via the internet from my existing service. Works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kroll

customer_reviews.title: It works, with some caveats
customer_reviews.text: The Tivo Stream does exactly what it claims to do ... stream to your iPad/iPhone and allow you to download shows to those devices for offline play. However, there are two caveats, one well known and the other less so. First, the known one, is that it's /just/ for on your local LAN. It definitely isn't a replacement for your SlingBox, as it won't allow remote connections. Secondly, the surprise, is that it's the loudest device in my A/V stack ... it's fan is surprisingly noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Martin

customer_reviews.title: I was unable to get past the first step of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to get past the first step of the setup even after multiple attempts to troubleshoot. It was a very disappointing purchase and I have returned this paperweight. I hope others have more luck.
customer_reviews.author: Memory Gray

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: I think I watch more TV on my iPad now, than on my big screen TV. It's great for when I'm working out on my elliptical machine. I put my headphones on and I don't disturb anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the flexibility to use my iPad to watch TV in different parts of my home which I like. In some cases I may use it to watch movies when traveling, although I have not done that yet.
customer_reviews.author: krspike

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed, even watched shows when i was overseas. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Freese

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy install
customer_reviews.text: The TiVo stream was very easy to setup and to connect to my iPad. I now can download to my I pad all the content from my TiVo. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R

customer_reviews.title: Works great, excellent extention of service.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and add functionality to mobile devices but the fan can be noisy and I whish it could be wall mounted.
customer_reviews.author: NC Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, well engineered. I use it with a Roamio OTA TiVo and a Samsung 10.1 tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers have noted that it can be unstable and I have seen that on occasion. However, it largely works very well. I haven;t yet used it outside of the house to see if the streaming works over the web but it works pretty well over WI-FI at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Does help with streaming
customer_reviews.text: Had. Difficulty configuring. But did work well once the configuration was completed
customer_reviews.author: shivakumar janardhanan

customer_reviews.title: The best thing Tivo ever did!
customer_reviews.text: For me traveling on the road for 200+ days a years I was using a Sling Box. Well that kinda worked but now with Stream the Sling Box is headed to EBAY! Get one and you will not regret it! I am a Tivo user since 1999.
customer_reviews.author: William G. L.

customer_reviews.title: Another piece of the TV/Entertainment Package from TiVo!
customer_reviews.text: Stream is awesome and allows us to watch virtually everything on our iPad which makes our entertainment experience incredible. We love it...
customer_reviews.author: JFittMA

customer_reviews.title: Able to take my tivo on the go
customer_reviews.text: Able to take my tivo with me. Remote streaming is good enough, remote download allows for high quality downloads thought it will take time.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Tivo is the best dvr experience ever. The  streaming function is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We are now watching our Tivo most of the time. It is great to have our DVR functions and streaming functions all in one place. The apps are well designed and intuitive. As we move further into the world of streaming entertainment, this is a good place to be!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Cat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Now I can watch my local news shows while on vacation. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Dick Riess

product_meta.title: TiVo TCDA94000 Stream for TiVo Premiere and Roamio DVRs
product_meta.description:
TIVO STREAM

RECORD. TRANSFER. GO. 
TiVo Stream adds flexibility to your TiVo experience by letting you stream shows to mobile devices in your home, or wirelessly transfer shows and take them on the go. Imagine enjoying your favorite cooking show while preparing dinner or catching the ball game by the grill. Maybe you just want to send the kids upstairs to watch SpongeBob out of earshot. With TiVo Stream suddenly everybody's happy. 


WHAT YOU'LL NEED
 * One or more iPad®, iPhone®, and iPod touch® devices running iOS 5.1 or later
 * At least one TiVo Premiere series DVR
 * Free TiVo® App for iPad, iPhone or iPod touch
 * A wired Ethernet or MoCA connection between your DVR and home network
 * No additional service fee


Download the TiVo brochure 




"WATCH NOW" FLYOUT

Find something good to watch while browsing the Guide? Press the "Watch Now" button and you can choose to watch that show on your TV or on your iPad. It's a great way to keep everybody in the house happy when the big screen is occupied.





* Broadband internet connection required and additional fees may apply for receipt of third-party services. Netflix unlimited membership required. See Netflix.com for details.
** TiVo Service Plan requirements (See tivo.com for details.) TiVo service is required and sold separately. No functionality is represented or should be expected without a paid subscription to the TiVo service.
† Designed for use only with digital cable systems. It does not receive analog programming, including over-the-air, and will not work with an over-the-air antenna. If you are unsure whether your cable operator's service provides digital simulcast of all analog programming, please contact your provider to determine whether it offers all-digital or digital simulcast service.
© 2013 TiVo Inc. All rights reserved. TiVo, the TiVo logo, the Thumbs Up logo, and the Thumbs Down logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of TiVo Inc. or its subsidiaries worldwide. iPhone and iPad are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. CableCARD is a trademarkof Cable Television Laboratories, Inc. Imagery from Tribune Media Services. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

.
feature_bullets: Stream up to four recorded shows simultaneously
Watch a show on a mobile device as it’s recorded
Wirelessly transfer shows to mobile devices
